verses.name: Mark 8:14
verses.text: Now the disciples had forgotten to take bread, neither had they in the ship with them more than one loaf.

verses.name: Mark 8:15
verses.text: And he charged them, saying, Take heed, beware of the leaven of the Pharisees, and of the leaven of Herod.

verses.name: Mark 8:16
verses.text: And they reasoned among themselves, saying, It is because we have no bread.

verses.name: Mark 8:17
verses.text: And when Jesus knew it, he saith unto them, Why reason ye, because ye have no bread? perceive ye not yet, neither understand? have ye your heart yet hardened?

verses.name: Mark 8:18
verses.text: Having eyes, see ye not? and having ears, hear ye not? and do ye not remember?
